      • calculateTotals

        public void calculateTotals(int scale,
                   int taxQuantityRule)
        We calculate finalPriceIncTax, finalPriceExTax and tax starting from price which is the price of one product without options and without tax. If discountPercent is not null, we apply a discount to the finalPriceExTax once we've calculated the final price by adding option values.
        Parameters:
        scale - The scale used in the calculations
        taxQuantityRule - The tax calculation rule to use

      • getType

        public int getType()
        Description copied from interface: OrderProductIf
        product type.
        • com.konakart.bl.ProductMgr.PHYSICAL_PRODUCT = physical product
        • com.konakart.bl.ProductMgr.DIGITAL_DOWNLOAD = digital download product
        • com.konakart.bl.ProductMgr.FREE_SHIPPING = physical product with free shipping
        • com.konakart.bl.ProductMgr.BUNDLE_PRODUCT_TYPE = a product that bundles other product
        • com.konakart.bl.ProductMgr.FREE_SHIPPING_BUNDLE_PRODUCT_TYPE = a product that bundles other product with free shipping
        • com.konakart.bl.ProductMgr.GIFT_CERTIFICATE_PRODUCT_TYPE = a gift certificate product
        • com.konakart.bl.ProductMgr.BOOKABLE_PRODUCT_TYPE = a product that has a schedule and can have bookings (i.e. a training course)
        • com.konakart.bl.ProductMgr.VIRTUAL_PRODUCT_TYPE = a virtual product such as a service, warranty or donation
        Specified by:
        getType in interface OrderProductIf
        Returns:
        Returns the type.

      • getState

        public int getState()
        Description copied from interface: OrderProductIf
        The state of the product when added to the order. It can be user defined and can indicate for example if a product isn't in stock. When the order is created using the CreateOrder API call it is set to the following values:
        • com.konakart.bl.OrderMgr.ORD_PROD_IN_STOCK = The product is in stock
        • com.konakart.bl.OrderMgr.ORD_PROD_OUT_OF_STOCK_AVAILABLE_DATE_KNOWN = Product out of stock but with known availability date
        • com.konakart.bl.OrderMgr.ORD_PROD_OUT_OF_STOCK_AVAILABLE_DATE_UNKNOWN = Product out of stock and availability date unknown
        • com.konakart.bl.OrderMgr.ORD_PROD_PARTIALLY_OUT_OF_STOCK_AVAILABLE_DATE_KNOWN = Product not in stock with the required quantity but with known availability date
        • com.konakart.bl.OrderMgr.ORD_PROD_PARTIALLY_OUT_OF_STOCK_AVAILABLE_DATE_UNKNOWN = Product not in stock with the required quantity and availability date unknown
        • com.konakart.bl.OrderMgr.ORD_PROD_CUSTOMER_INFORMED_OF_DELIVERY_DATE = Product wasn't in stock but customer has been informed of the delivery date
        The value can be changed before saving the order.
        Specified by:
        getState in interface OrderProductIf
        Returns:
        the state

      • setState

        public void setState(int state)
        Description copied from interface: OrderProductIf
        The state of the product when added to the order. It can be user defined and can indicate for example if a product isn't in stock. When the order is created using the CreateOrder API call it is set to the following values:
        • com.konakart.bl.OrderMgr.ORD_PROD_IN_STOCK = The product is in stock
        • com.konakart.bl.OrderMgr.ORD_PROD_OUT_OF_STOCK_AVAILABLE_DATE_KNOWN = Product out of stock but with known availability date
        • com.konakart.bl.OrderMgr.ORD_PROD_OUT_OF_STOCK_AVAILABLE_DATE_UNKNOWN = Product out of stock and availability date unknown
        • com.konakart.bl.OrderMgr.ORD_PROD_PARTIALLY_OUT_OF_STOCK_AVAILABLE_DATE_KNOWN = Product not in stock with the required quantity but with known availability date
        • com.konakart.bl.OrderMgr.ORD_PROD_PARTIALLY_OUT_OF_STOCK_AVAILABLE_DATE_UNKNOWN = Product not in stock with the required quantity and availability date unknown
        • com.konakart.bl.OrderMgr.ORD_PROD_CUSTOMER_INFORMED_OF_DELIVERY_DATE = Product wasn't in stock but customer has been informed of the delivery date
        The value can be changed before saving the order.
        Specified by:
        setState in interface OrderProductIf
        Parameters:
        state - the state to set
